workshop_settings.post_install:
modname=$( awk -F "=" '/name/ {print $2}' %mods_full_path%/steamapps/workshop/content/107410/%workshop_mod_id%/meta.cpp | tr -d [:punct:]) tempname="@${modname}" modfolder="$(echo -e "${tempname}" | tr -d '[:space:]')" cp -Rf "%mods_full_path%/steamapps/workshop/content/107410/%workshop_mod_id%" "%mods_full_path%/$modfolder" touch "%mods_full_path%/$modfolder/%workshop_mod_id%" cp -f %mods_full_path%/$modfolder/keys/*.bikey %mods_full_path%/keys/ rm -Rf "%mods_full_path%/steamapps/workshop/content/107410/%workshop_mod_id%" ws_mod_name="$(echo -e "${tempname}" | tr -d '[:space:]')" ws_id="221100" echo "$ws_id;%workshop_mod_id%;$ws_mod_name;$(date +%s)" >> "ws_mods.txt"
printf "\nDone!"
workshop_settings.uninstall:
a=%mods_full_path%
modid=$(find $a -iname "%mod_string%")
modfolder=$(dirname $modid) echo $modfolder rm -Rf $modfolder printf "\n %mod_string% automatically uninstall. \n"
